name: Multiplayer Mercs
description:
Multiplayer Mercs

Bad Dudes are attacking the Refinery, it is up to You and Your Elite Force Team to Stop Them !

The game includes a Multiplayer & Single Player system
You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Icon on the Main Menu !

* NOTE : You should have a Stable & Fast Internet Connection for Best Results *


Features:
- Shooting Enemy AIs
- Enemies use the Same Weapons the Players use
- Weapon Crates to Change the Default Loadout
- Hitscan Weapons with Projectiles
- Menu System
- Many Weapon Types
- Ammo Pickups
- Health Pickups
- Works Directly with Steam Online Subsystem
- Invite System from Main Start Menu
- Multiplayer Tested under load
